titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit contributions by multicandidate political committees and to limit contributions in House of Representatives elections from persons other than individual in-State residents.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

bill.summary: 01/04/1995--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to: (1) prohibit multicandidate political committee contributions; and (2) limit contributions in House of Representatives elections from persons other than in-State residents.
